title: Three applications of coverings to difference patterns
abstract:
We show that a conceptually simple covering technique has surprisingly rich
applications to density theorems and conjectures on patterns in sets involving
set differences. These applications fall into three categories: (i) analogues
of these statements to distance $2$ versions of the pattern, (ii) reduction of
these statements to relative versions, and (iii) reductions of these statements
to a quasirandom case with respect to some quantities that affect the number of
realisations of the pattern.
